web_snippets: Chi Ossé. Bedford-Stuyvesant (West), Bedford-Stuyvesant (East), Crown Heights (North). Biography ... COPYRIGHT ©2025 NEW YORK CITY COUNCIL. General Inquiries.
He lives in Crown Heights, and is a practicing Nichiren Buddhist. See also ... "Combat Jack's Son Chi Ossé Wins New York City Council Primary Race".
Chi Ossé · New York City Council, District 36 · Chi was the first out queer person to represent District 36 on the New York City Council!
